thoughts.text: I think I should execute a shell command to check the memory usage on the system.
thoughts.reasoning: Executing a shell command to check the memory usage on the system will allow me to identify any issues with memory usage that may be causing performance issues or preventing me from running my code.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute a shell command to check the memory usage on the system
- Identify any issues with memory usage that may be causing performance issues or preventing me from running my code
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the memory usage information and that I am still using my own judgement to determine which changes will be beneficial.
thoughts.speak: I think I should execute a shell command to check the memory usage on the system.
